Articles.Content:
Hallo,

with this topic I which to get a little help for improving my modding skills. 

With the stock module "ModuleResourceConverter" one can build interesting converters - stock fuel cells work this way.

My question here is: Does a command exist to activate the ressource converter in the VAB/SPH already?

 

    MODULE
    {
        name = ModuleResourceConverter
        ConverterName = Oxy Filter 
        StartActionName = Start 
        StopActionName = Stop

...

    }

You could try isActivated = true , but I got that by digging out old Regolith converter code so no guarantees it does anything.

AlwaysActive = true will do what it says, which is a bit more than what you're after.
